snippet: A Palestinian boy was struck in the head by a bullet during clashes between Israeli forces and militants in southeast Gaza on Thursday.
abstract: Ahmed Abu Dagga, 11-year-old Palestinian boy, is killed during clashes between Israeli forces and Hamas militants in southeast Gaza; Hamas blames Israeli fire.
lead_paragraph: A Palestinian boy was struck in the head by a bullet during clashes between Israeli forces and militants in southeast Gaza on Thursday.

headline.main: Gaza: Boy Killed as Militants Clash With Israeli Force
headline.print_headline: Gaza: Boy Killed as Militants Clash With Israeli Force
